name: jQuery.parseHTML
title: jQuery.parseHTML()
desc: Parses a string into an array of DOM nodes.

argument.desc: DOM element to serve as the context in which the HTML fragment will be created
argument.name: context

argument.desc: A Boolean indicating whether to include scripts passed in the HTML string
argument.name: keepScripts

examples.desc: Create an array of Dom nodes using an HTML string and insert it into a div.

entries.longdesc: jQuery.parseHTML uses a native DOM element creation function to convert the string to a set of DOM elements, which can then be inserted into the document.
